A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible treatment of Luke Skywalker\, disappointing usage of Finn's character\, Rey is essentially a Mary Sue for Rian Johnson to project himself into with no redeeming qualities or significant struggles to warrant how near perfect she is\, Snoke is wasted before he can be used more effectively in the next film\, more old characters from the original trilogy are killed off unnecessarily\, nonsensical plot points concerning Holdo withholding vital strategic information\, Leia is criminally unused\, Rose's character gets in the way of the narrative and stops any interesting dynamic that was blooming between Rey and Finn in The Force Awakens\, Captain Phasma is made into a joke and unused (again)\, and finally there's too much comedy.\n\nOverall a weak entry in this franchise. At least the visuals and the music are good.
